post.description: Checks whether an email address is already registered

delete.description: Marks an account as deleted by setting status to USER_DELETED

post.description: Cancels a pending invitation and invalidates the invite session
Resends invitation email to a pending account
Creates a test account with the provided details and optionally logs in as that account

parameters.description: Set to login as the created user
parameters.name: login_as

put.description: Updates the user's primary email address for unverified accounts
Updates the user's password after verifying current password

post.description: Sets a password for the first time on an existing account using invite verification
Resends the email verification link to the user's email address

get.description: Retrieves the authenticated user's account details with joined data
Validates whether a password reset key is still valid and active

post.description: Resets the user's password using the reset key from email
Sends a password reset email with a temporary session key
Creates a new account with email and password or completes invited user signup
Completes signup process for OAuth authenticated users
Verifies a user's email address using the verification key and creates a user session
Verifies an account invitation using the verification key and creates a user session
